document.full_text: the united states is deploying additional radiation monitors on hawaii and other u.s. islands even though it does not expect harmful levels of radiation from damaged japanese nuclear power plants to reach u.s. soil, environmental regulators said.
document.title: more radiation detectors deployed on u.s. islands
lines_and_colors: the united states is deploying additional radiation monitors on hawaii and other u.s. islands even though it does not expect harmful levels of radiation from damaged japanese nuclear power plants to reach u.s. soil, environmental regulators said.
